title: Some widget or script make me lose the game.
body: In the game just after 4mins,  me and J4 were disconnect, and until the end of the game, we can not reconnect. My internet has no problem, because my friend also play the LOL, and it is normaly. I know there is some program can lead others disconnect.

replies.body: It sounds likely that you may have been impacted by an issue that is occuring at the moment - we're keeping [this thread updated](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/RF70PdWb-game-start-game-disconnect-issues-17032016) with information as soon as we can.

Hey man,
Sorry to hear that you could not reconnect to your game. I believe that this was of no malicious attempt and no one purposefully tried to crash your game. Riot has fixed this and should no happen anymore, 

Yours Sincerely,
Talwyn
